data.title: Rolo Tomassi announce new album, UK tour
data.meta_description: UK band Rolo Tomassi have announced their next album, Astraea, will be released on November 5, 2012. The band will be releasing the album via their own label, Destination Moon. Their previous album, Cosmology, was released in 2010.  The band has also announced a headlining tour of the UK with Oa...
data.text:
UK band Rolo Tomassi have announced their next album, Astraea, will be released on November 5, 2012. The band will be releasing the album via their own label, Destination Moon. Their previous album, Cosmology, was released in 2010.

The band has also announced a headlining tour of the UK with Oathbreaker and Goodtime Boys.
